summary.span: 表示顯示在 或 上的可選取選項。

span.span: Represents a selectable option displayed on a or .

summary.span: 雖然 會取代並且將功能加入至之前版本的 控制項；不過，也可以選擇保留 ，以提供回溯相容性 (Backward Compatibility) 以及供未來使用。

span.span: Although replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是適用於和處理功能表的特殊反白顯示、 配置和資料行排列。 is a that works with and to handle the special highlighting, layout, and column arrangement for menus. 為了讓若要顯示，您必須新增至或。In order for a to be displayed, you must add it to a or . 類別提供的內容，讓您設定的外觀和功能的功能表項目。The class provides properties that enable you to configure the appearance and functionality of a menu item. 若要顯示功能表項目旁的核取記號，請使用屬性。To display a check mark next to a menu item, use the property. 此功能可用來識別在互斥的功能表項目清單中選取的功能表項目。Use this feature to identify a menu item that is selected in a list of mutually exclusive menu items. 例如，如果您有一組功能表項目來設定中的文字色彩的控制，請使用屬性來識別目前選取的色彩。For example, if you have a set of menu items for setting the color of text in a control, use the property to identify which color is currently selected. 使用屬性可定義要選取功能表項目是可以按下鍵盤組合。Use the property to define a keyboard combination that can be pressed to select the menu item. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將的指定的功能表項目。The following code example adds a to the specified menu items of a . 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This code example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回`false`如果且只有為未選取狀態。The property returns `false` if and only if the is unchecked. 已核取或是不定項目時，以.NET Framework 4.5.2 中，從開始，對應的圖示可能會調整大小。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, when an item is checked or indeterminate, the corresponding icon may be resized. 調整大小取決於系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目：Resizing is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ToolStripMenuItem1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripMenuItem1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#495](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#495)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#495](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#495)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來控制，或決定是否一開始為選取，未選取，或處於不定狀態。Use the property to control or determine whether a is initially checked, unchecked, or in an indeterminate state. 從.NET Framework 4.5.2 中，如果屬性設定為或，對應的圖示大小可能會調整。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, if the property is set to or , the corresponding icon may be resized. 調整大小取決於系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目：Resizing is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ```

protected: override System::Windows::Forms::AccessibleObject ^ CreateAccessibilityInstance();

summary.span: 為 建立新的協助工具物件。

span.span: Creates a new accessibility object for the .
A new for the .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法來建立協助工具感知的圖表控制，請使用和類別會公開可存取的資訊。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to create an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製兩條曲線，以及一個圖例。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，用於方法以提供圖表控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不是實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製所 chart 控制項中，它不會不含任何內建的可存取資訊。Because the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 因為這個緣故，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別覆寫方法以傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示每個部分的圖例可存取的資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供必要的可存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 這個程式碼範例是，請參閱完整的程式碼範例的一部分類別概觀。This code example is part of a complete code example that can be found at the class overview. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫在衍生類別，以設定的預設大小。Override in derived classes to configure a default size for a . 這是將大小設定控制項的建構函式中更有效率。This is more efficient than setting the size in the control's constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 取得或設定快速鍵文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the shortcut key text.
A representing the shortcut key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來取得或設定顯示為快速鍵的文字。Use this property to get or set the text that is displayed as the shortcut key. ## Examples 下列範例會將指派到指定的文字。The following example assigns the specified text to the . 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Forms.Keys ShortcutKeys { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Keys ShortcutKeys
Public Property ShortcutKeys As Keys
public: property System::Windows::Forms::Keys ShortcutKeys { System::Windows::Forms::Keys get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::Keys value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與 關聯的快速鍵。

span.span: Gets or sets the shortcut keys associated with the .
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性將功能表命令，例如 CTRL + C 鍵的按鍵組合**複製**命令。Use the property to assign a key combination to a menu command, such as CTRL+C for the **Copy** command. 您可以使用快速鍵，而不是，或除了存取金鑰，也就是功能表或 ALT 鍵搭配使用的功能表項目中加底線的字母。You can use shortcut keys instead of or in addition to access keys, which are underscored letters in menus or menu items used with the ALT key. 輸入連字號 (&) 您要使用便捷鍵的字母前，請在程式碼中定義便捷鍵。Define access keys in code by typing an ampersand (&) before the letter you want to use for an access key. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用要指派的按鍵組合 CTRL + P 功能表項目的內容呼叫`printToolStripMenuItem`。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to assign the key combination CTRL+P to a menu item called `printToolStripMenuItem`. 完整的範例，請參閱[如何： 加入 Web 瀏覽器功能加入 Windows Form 應用程式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CS/form1.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/VB/form1.vb#100)]

exception.span: 屬性未設定為其中一個 值。

span.span: The property was not set to one of the values.
